Want to stay in a place which feels like home?
We are here to serve.

About Us

We are a homestay. In the beautiful town named Banikhet. Which is 6KM form the paradise, Dalhousie. We have serving our customers from 23 NOV 2019. Till then we got a chance to serve 12 families and 4 individual travellers. We are registed with AirBNB. Here is the link of our profile. We have also colaborated with other adventure sport groups locally to provide much more than just a homely feeling in these beautiful mountains.


Services that makes us different!

You might be thinking about, why to choose Aashray?
When there are a ton of homestays available in the town.
So, let us give you not one but many reasons that set us apart from others at NO EXTRA COST. These services include but are not limited to:

Free Wifi
Bonn fire
Away form main town
One time Carwash
Parking Space
Open Space

Testimonials

We stayed here for two days. It is not very far from bus stand but far enough from Chaos of bus stand traffic and noise. View from the balcony was superb. Room and toilet were neat and clean.Food was similar to home and pretty hygienic .Shubham and his family was very cooperative .It was a memorable stay.

Hemendra K NEW DELHI, INDIA

All rooms were very neat,clean and ventilated.Shubh,the host was very co-operative and gave us very good service.Home cooked food was also very very nice.we were three families and loved to stay there,thanks shubh and family.

Nidhi G GURGAON, INDIA
